abstract: Erik Soler, the general manager and sporting director of the Red Bulls, said Tuesday that Coach Hans Backe will be back with the club next season even if it fails to qualify for the playoffs in Major League Soccer.
snippet: Erik Soler, the general manager and sporting director of the Red Bulls, said Tuesday that Coach Hans Backe will be back with the club next season even if it fails to qualify for the playoffs in Major League Soccer.

headline.main: Red Bulls' Soler Looks Back and Peeks Ahead
